articles.title: Asteroid Bennu samples collected by NASA's OSIRIS-REx have building blocks of life, reveals study - HT Tech
articles.description: The samples collected by NASA's OSIRIS-REx mission from the asteroid Bennu have resulted in a groundbreaking discovery as the presence of carbon and water has been discovered - the key building blocks of life.
